search_input:
The condition is exacerbated when the buildings windows are glazed in tinted glass. Light and colour God created the heavens and the Earth in the very beginningand God said Let there be light Light is one. It only appears multiple and diverse because of the intervention of darkness which lacks intrinsic reality. Without light there is pure nothingness.

*Light is the source of all visual information, and darkness is merely the absence of it. This concept is often overlooked in modern architecture, where the emphasis is on creating dramatic effects through the use of dark and moody colour schemes. However, this approach can lead to a disconnection between the building and its surroundings, and even the occupants themselves.*
